allow:
Bash(# Extract unique class names from each file and find cross-file duplicates
for file in *.css; do
    grep -o "^\.[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9_-]*" "$file" | sed "s/^\.//" | sort | uniq | while read class; do
        echo "$class $file"
    done
done > all_unique_classes.tmp

# Group by class name and find those that appear in multiple files
sort all_unique_classes.tmp | uniq | awk '{print $1}' | sort | uniq -c | awk '$1 > 1 {print $2}' | while read class; do
    files=$(grep "^$class " all_unique_classes.tmp | awk '{print $2}' | sort | uniq | tr '\n' ', ' | sed 's/,$//')
    file_count=$(echo "$files" | tr ',' '\n' | wc -l)
    echo "Class .$class appears in $file_count files: $files"
done

rm all_unique_classes.tmp)
